hero.title: Welcome to the Perfect Starting Point.
hero.subtitle: Your reliable partner in your health tourism journey. Come to Turkey for quality health services.

contactForm.title: Free Consultation
contactForm.subtitle: Consult with our expert team to determine the most suitable treatment plan for you.
contactForm.name: Your Full Name
contactForm.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide the highest quality healthcare services with our expert team and modern technology.

hair.title: Hair Transplant
hair.subtitle: Expert hair transplant services for natural and permanent results.
hair.description: We achieve natural and permanent results with modern hair transplant techniques. We prepare personalized treatment plans for each patient.

fue.title: FUE Technique
fue.description: We achieve natural results by extracting hair follicles one by one using the Follicular Unit Extraction technique. Minimal invasive with fast recovery process.

sapphire.title: Sapphire FUE Technique
sapphire.description: We make more precise and sharp incisions using sapphire blades. We provide less trauma and faster recovery.

dhi.title: DHI Technique
dhi.description: We place hair follicles directly to the target area with Direct Hair Implantation. Maximum density and natural appearance.

women.title: Women's Hair Transplant
women.description: We achieve natural results with women-specific hair transplant techniques while preserving fine hair strands.

beard.title: Beard Transplant
beard.description: We perform natural-looking beard transplantation with special techniques for beard and mustache areas.

dental.title: Dental Treatments
dental.subtitle: Renew your smile with modern dentistry technologies.
dental.description: We provide aesthetic and functional results with comprehensive dental treatments. We perfect your smile with modern technology and expert team.

smile.title: Smile Aesthetics
smile.description: We create personalized aesthetic tooth design by analyzing your smile. We achieve natural and harmonious results.

laminate.title: Laminate Veneer
laminate.description: We achieve perfect smile by covering the front surface of your teeth with thin porcelain sheets.

zirconium.title: Zirconium Coating
zirconium.description: We make natural-looking and long-lasting tooth coatings with durable zirconium material.

implant.title: Implant
implant.description: We complete your missing teeth with modern implant technologies. We provide natural appearance and function.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontic Treatments
orthodontics.description: We achieve aesthetic and healthy tooth alignment by straightening crooked teeth.

whitening.title: Teeth Whitening
whitening.description: We achieve bright and white smile with professional teeth whitening techniques.

plastic.title: Plastic Surgery
plastic.subtitle: Reveal your beauty with safe and natural aesthetic surgeries.
plastic.description: We achieve safe and natural results with our experienced plastic surgeons. We prepare personalized treatment plans for each patient.

rhinoplasty.title: Rhinoplasty
rhinoplasty.description: We achieve natural appearance that harmonizes with your face by improving nose shape and function.

breastAugmentation.title: Breast Augmentation
breastAugmentation.description: We perform safe and natural-looking breast augmentation surgeries with modern implant technologies.

breastReduction.title: Breast Reduction
breastReduction.description: We balance your body proportions and eliminate physical discomforts by reducing large breasts.

tummyTuck.title: Tummy Tuck
tummyTuck.description: We achieve flat and toned abdomen by tightening loose abdominal skin.

armLift.title: Arm Lift
armLift.description: We provide younger and toned arm appearance by tightening saggy arm skin.

bbl.title: BBL
bbl.description: We achieve fuller and more aesthetic appearance by shaping your hip area with Brazilian Butt Lift.

neckLift.title: Neck Lift
neckLift.description: We provide younger and tighter appearance by eliminating sagging in the neck area.

earSurgery.title: Ear Surgery
earSurgery.description: We achieve natural ear shape that harmonizes with your face by correcting protruding ears.

journey.title: Your Journey
journey.subtitle: We guide you through your health tourism process.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.desc: We evaluate your health condition and offer you the most suitable treatment plan.
step1.process: Detailed analysis of your health condition and presentation of treatment options

step2.title: Planning
step2.desc: We plan your treatment process in detail and make all necessary arrangements.
step2.process: Creation of treatment program, accommodation and transfer arrangements

step3.title: Travel
step3.desc: We make all arrangements for safe and comfortable travel to Turkey.

step4.title: Treatment
step4.desc: We perform your treatment with modern medical devices and our expert team.
step4.process: Professional treatment process, continuous monitoring and care

step5.title: Recovery
step5.desc: We support you in the post-treatment process and monitor your recovery.
step5.process: Post-treatment monitoring, checkups and necessary adjustments

step6.title: Follow-up
step6.desc: We monitor long-term results and make necessary adjustments.

cta.title: Start Your Journey
cta.subtitle: Meet our expert team and create your treatment plan.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Feedback from our customers who share their experiences.
reviews.heading: What Our Customers Say

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: What you wonder about health tourism.
faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Health tourism is traveling to another country to receive medical treatment, often at a lower cost or with better quality than available locally.
faq.q2: How long does the treatment process take?
faq.a2: Treatment duration varies depending on the procedure. Simple treatments may take 1-2 days, while complex surgeries may require 1-2 weeks.
faq.a3: You will need your passport, medical records, recent photos, and any previous treatment documentation. We will provide a complete list during consultation.

cta.title: Take Action Now for Your Health
cta.subtitle: We provide you with the best service with our expert team and accredited partners.

chatForm.title: Contact Form
chatForm.subtitle: We're here to help! Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

agency.title: Be Safe Health
agency.paragraph1: Be Safe Health Company is an organization specialized in health tourism, providing reliable and quality services. We work to provide our customers with the best healthcare services.
agency.paragraph2: With our experienced team and reliable partners, we guide you through your health tourism process. We provide the highest quality treatment services with modern medical devices and expert doctors.
agency.paragraph3: With our customer satisfaction-oriented approach and transparent pricing policy, we serve as a reliable partner in the field of health tourism.

aboutExtra.teamDesc: We provide the highest quality healthcare services with our experienced and expert team. Each member works to provide our customers with the best experience.
aboutExtra.tourismDesc: Using Turkey's advantages in health tourism, we provide services at international standards. We provide reliable treatment services with modern hospitals and expert doctors.

agency.title: About Us
agency.paragraph1: We are a leading health tourism company that provides comprehensive healthcare services to international patients. Our mission is to connect patients with the best medical facilities and specialists in Turkey.
agency.paragraph2: With years of experience in the healthcare industry, we have established strong partnerships with renowned hospitals and clinics across Turkey. We ensure that every patient receives personalized care and attention throughout their medical journey.
agency.paragraph3: Our team of healthcare professionals and travel coordinators work together to provide seamless medical tourism experiences, from initial consultation to post-treatment care and follow-up.

values.patient_first: Patient-First Approach: We prioritize your health and well-being above everything else.
values.transparent_pricing: Transparent Pricing: No hidden costs, clear and honest pricing for all services.
values.world_class: World-Class Standards: We maintain international healthcare standards in all our services.
values.coordination: Complete Coordination: We handle all aspects of your medical journey from start to finish.

aboutExtra.teamDesc: Our team consists of experienced healthcare professionals, travel coordinators, and patient care specialists who are dedicated to providing exceptional service. We work closely with leading medical institutions and specialists to ensure the best possible outcomes for our patients.
aboutExtra.tourismDesc: Turkey has become a global destination for health tourism, offering world-class medical facilities at competitive prices. We leverage this advantage to provide our patients with access to cutting-edge medical technology and highly skilled healthcare professionals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for any questions or to schedule your consultation.
